transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir, very good evening Kritika baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Thoda mai bahar hi hu. Mai abhi tak nahi pahucha.
Executive: Abhi tak nahi pahucha sir. To kab tak free ho jaoge aap?
Customer: Kal kal subah 9 o'clock.
Executive: Achcha sir, waise ek cheez bataiye aap mujhe. Aapne apna jo yaha pe concern dala hua hai na sir ye aapne catalog link wagera diya hua hai number add on karaya hua hai GST number.
Customer: Hmm. Diya hua hai.
Executive: Aur message kiya tha aapne sir helpline pe. To aap bata sakte ho mujhe kis liye bheja tha aapne? Haan? Matlab ki aapne kis liye bheja tha apne GST number aur aapka ye catalog view aur apne matlab teen numbers the aapke GST number wagera. To ye aapne sir kis reason se aapne bheja hua tha ye?
Customer: Kisko bheja tha?
Executive: Sir aapne hamare paas apni GST detail share ki hai na isse related helpline desk pe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye aapne galti se share hua hai kya sir aapse ye?
Customer: Mera se?
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Mera hi number hai wo. Galat nahi keh rahe.
Executive: Haan aapne share kiya hua hai na hamare sath apne catalog views number aur ye teen numbers.
Customer: Oh madam wo hamara hi hai. Kya problem hai boliye?
Executive: Ye aapse galti se share hue hai sir kyuki aapne hamare paas share kar diya ye. To ye aapka galti se share hua hai ya kisi customer ko aap share kar rahe the?
Customer: Aap kya baat kar rahe hai mere ko samajh me nahi aa raha hai. Mai kal subah 9 baje ko baat karta hu.
Executive: Sir ek minute ruko mai ek second. Give me only one minute.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Haan ji sir aap se morning me baat kiya tha na maine Saloni bol rahi hu. Bas ye sir puchna tha aapne na actually customer care pe hamare yaha detail bheji thi apne company se related Green Global ki Globe ki jisme aapne apni company ka naam likha hai Bengaluru likha hai IndiaMART verified supplier aur GST ka number aapka likha hai. Aur usme view our catalog ka aapne ek link diya hai apna hi khud ka domain ka www.thegreenglobe.in aur aapne usme number diye hai apne teen 9729955255 dusra hai 7259030137 aur teesra hai 6362862689.
Customer: Hmm. Ye kabhi hamara hi hai.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji to ye jo aapne detail di hai na ye hamare customer care pe aapne bhej di hai. To ye matlab kis regarding?
Customer: Delete kar dijiye na.
Executive: Achcha matlab ye aapne mistakenly bhej diya hai kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi jaan bujh ke nahi kiya.
Executive: Haan haan wahi puch rahi hu. Thik hai aur ek aur sir concern bas ye tha ki aapne na Kritika ji se discussion kiya tha Saturday ko call pe to uske regarding.
Customer: Mai subah kal subah baat karta hu karke bola tha.
Executive: Haan right to aapne na usme unki jo discussion hua hai aap se us din Saturday ko.
Customer: Kal subah baat karta hu karke bol diya to mai driving me hu na.
Executive: Haan haan bas sir usi me hi discussion puch rahi hu ki aapne na unki call pe not satisfied ka feedback diya hai to unki call se aapko koi issue tha koi problem thi jis wajah se aapne dal diya ya fir ye bhi galti se ho gaya tha.
Customer: Haan haan achcha.
Executive: Matlab ye aap se galti se ho gaya ya fir aapko kuch problem tha usme is wajah se aapne dala hai not satisfied.
Customer: Not satisfied I think they are not given proper this one I am telling that they are not at the time while we discuss with the something I am not satisfied with so that's why I have given I am not satisfied isme kya hai.
Executive: Okay nahi nahi nahi usme not satisfied ki wajah se hi after service ka correction jo bhi problem hai wo karwana tha.
Customer: Nahi nahi kal subah isliye baat karta hu karke bola na.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai chaliye fir kal aapko connect karti hu kal 11 am ke regarding karu ya 12 baje ke aas pass karu kis time karu?
Executive: Thik hai thik hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer mistakenly sent details to customer care.

- Customer gave 'not satisfied' feedback on call.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed details sent to customer care.

- Executive offered to connect next day to discuss feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- customer care, feedback, not satisfied, details
